      • calculateGpa

        public double calculateGpa()
        Method to calculate GPA Process to calculate GPA: GradeEquvalent * noOf CreditHours for particular Subject which are known as quality points. GPA = Sum of all quality points divided by Total no of Credit Hours for the term obtained by adding credit hours of each subject.
        Returns:
        double Returns the final calculated GPA of the student.
